title: Transform portfolio into Mobbin-inspired UI with premium animations

requirements.text: Replace all existing scroll animations with Framer Motion-based advanced animations including staggered children, spring physics, parallax effects, and micro-interactions throughout all sections (Hero, About, Experience, Projects, Skills, Contact)
acceptanceCriteria: All sections use Framer Motion instead of Intersection Observer for animations
Staggered animations apply to card grids and list items with spring physics
Smooth entrance animations with fade, slide, and scale combinations
Parallax scrolling effects on background elements
Animation timing and easing curves match premium UI standards

requirements.text: Implement Mobbin.com-style glassmorphism cards with backdrop blur, subtle borders, and gradient overlays for all content sections (About cards, Experience timeline, Project cards, Skills grid, Contact form)
acceptanceCriteria: Cards feature backdrop-filter blur with semi-transparent backgrounds
Subtle gradient borders using CSS gradients
Hover states with smooth glass panel effects and glow
Consistent glassmorphism aesthetic across all card components
Visual hierarchy maintained with varying opacity levels

requirements.text: Add UI/UX developer-themed interactive micro-interactions including magnetic cursor effects on buttons, morphing shapes on hover, ripple effects on clicks, and smooth page transitions between sections

quotes: efeccts relayted to my domain ui and ux dev

acceptanceCriteria: Buttons attract cursor with magnetic effect within proximity range
Click interactions trigger ripple animations
Smooth morphing animations on interactive elements during hover
Section transitions use slide or fade effects
All interactions feel responsive with spring physics

requirements.text: Enhance Hero section with animated gradient text that shifts colors, floating UI element mockups (wireframes, design tools icons) with parallax depth, and particle effects in the background

quotes: relayted to my domain ui and ux dev

acceptanceCriteria: Headline text features animated gradient that transitions smoothly
Floating mockup elements (wireframes, Figma icons) with 3D parallax movement
Background includes subtle particle system or grid animation
Elements respond to mouse movement for depth perception
Performance remains smooth with 60fps animations

requirements.text: Add reveal-on-scroll animations with mask effects, where content appears through animated masks (wipes, circles, splits) as user scrolls through each section
acceptanceCriteria: Section headings reveal with wipe or split mask animations
Images and cards appear through circular or rectangular masks
Mask animations synchronized with scroll progress
Smooth transitions with easing curves
Animations trigger at appropriate scroll thresholds

requirements.text: Implement premium hover effects on Project cards including 3D tilt on mouse movement, inner spotlight that follows cursor, and smooth scale transformations with glow effects
acceptanceCriteria: Project cards tilt in 3D based on cursor position
Spotlight effect follows mouse across card surface
Smooth scale animation on hover entry/exit
Gradient glow appears on hover with color matching theme
Performance optimized with transform and opacity only

requirements.text: Add animated background grid or mesh gradient that subtly morphs and shifts colors throughout the page, creating depth and visual interest without distracting from content
acceptanceCriteria: Animated mesh gradient or grid pattern in page background
Colors shift subtly over time using smooth transitions
Background provides depth without competing with content
Animation is GPU-accelerated for performance
Pattern complements existing teal/emerald theme

requirements.text: Enhance Skills bento grid with advanced card interactions including magnetic hover effects between adjacent cards, staggered flip animations on scroll reveal, and subtle pulsing glows on skill icons
acceptanceCriteria: Skill cards feature staggered flip or rotation animations on reveal
Adjacent cards react to hover with magnetic repulsion/attraction
Skill category icons pulse with glow effect
Smooth grid layout with responsive spacing
Animations enhance without overwhelming content

requirements.text: Add smooth page transition overlay with animated logo or loading state when navigating between major sections, creating seamless flow
acceptanceCriteria: Section transitions feature brief overlay animation
Loading state shows animated logo or spinner
Transitions are quick (200-400ms) but noticeable
Smooth fade or slide effects on content change
Navigation feels fluid and intentional

requirements.text: Implement scroll-linked animations where elements transform based on scroll position, including progress bars, timeline connections that draw in, and elements that morph as they enter viewport
acceptanceCriteria: Experience timeline features line that draws in with scroll
Progress indicators show scroll position through page
Elements transform smoothly based on scroll position
Scroll-linked animations use requestAnimationFrame for performance
Transforms are smooth and follow scroll velocity

constraints: Must maintain existing dark mode theme with teal/emerald accents
All animations must perform at 60fps on modern browsers
Preserve all existing content and sections (Hero, About, Experience, Projects, Skills, Contact)
Animations must be accessible and respect prefers-reduced-motion settings
Do not modify backend/main.mo or immutable frontend paths
nonGoals: Changing color scheme or brand identity
Modifying existing content text or information
Adding new sections or pages beyond animation enhancements
Implementing backend functionality or data persistence
Supporting outdated browsers or non-standard environments
